posts.post_title: SOLD: T201 Mecca Double Folder Turner/Stovall - poor...but affordable for the poor
posts.post_content:
Up for sale is the following T201 Mecca Double Folder of Terry Turner and George Stovall.  It has a nice solid HOLE PUNCH in the center of the card that is sorta hard to miss.

Please email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.

Shipping on me.  Looking for [STRIKE]$XX[/STRIKE] $SOLD via paypal f/f.
